00016 #ifndef UA_JOB_H_
00017 #define UA_JOB_H_
00018 
00019 #ifdef __cplusplus
00020 extern "C" {
00021 #endif
00022 
00023 struct UA_Connection;
00024 typedef struct UA_Connection UA_Connection;
00025 
00026 struct UA_Server;
00027 typedef struct UA_Server UA_Server;
00028 
00030 typedef struct {
00031     enum {
00032         UA_JOBTYPE_NOTHING, 
00033         UA_JOBTYPE_DETACHCONNECTION, 
00034         UA_JOBTYPE_BINARYMESSAGE_NETWORKLAYER, 
00035         UA_JOBTYPE_BINARYMESSAGE_ALLOCATED, 
00036         UA_JOBTYPE_METHODCALL, 
00037         UA_JOBTYPE_METHODCALL_DELAYED, 
00038     } type;
00039     union {
00040         UA_Connection *closeConnection;
00041         struct {
00042             UA_Connection *connection;
00043             UA_ByteString message;
00044         } binaryMessage;
00045         struct {
00046             void *data;
00047             void (*method)(UA_Server *server, void *data);
00048         } methodCall;
00049     } job;
00050 } UA_Job;
00051
